title: SBI chief says banks lack skills to lend to new sectors
description: SBI chairman C S Setty said that despite years of infrastructure lending, banks lack the skills to finance emerging areas like green energy and battery storage. He mentioned a surge in NPAs from corporate lending has pushed banks towards personal loans. SBI plans to establish a center of excellence for emerging areas in collaboration with global banks.
